data.message: thank you mr. president my name is Sylvester Anderson and I enjoyed your speech I hope and pray one day that I can get a chance to see you I am retired u.s. Marine I am also 5 time will Champion powerlifter I am a freedom fighter I love freedom fighter just like yourself dr. Martin Luther King and Booker T Washington Malcolm X Shirley Tubman Rosa Park and many many more that I will never know about God bless you I support you 100%
